subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: CARNOUSTIE, Scotland, July 21 (AP) — A 63-year-old woman was hit in the head by Tiger Woods’s ball when he sliced an approach shot at the British Open on Saturday. She needed two stitches to close the wound.
snippet: CARNOUSTIE, Scotland, July 21 (AP) — A 63-year-old woman was hit in the head by Tiger Woods’s ball when he sliced an approach shot at the British Open on Saturday. She needed two stitches to close the wound.
